nodes.text: The Surronian L19 heavy freighter was a class of transport. Smuggler Platt Okeefe suggested that pilots never buy a new L19 freighter unless they had the services of a good mechanic, in her addendum to Maz Kanata's Smuggler's Guide.

The L19 heavy freighter was first mentioned in Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide, a replica journal written by Daniel Wallace and first published in 2018. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, they were created in West End Games' roleplaying game.
